title: shambhO umApatE
sahitya:
shambhO umApatE shivashiva shankara dayAnidhE hara hara


 
P:  shambhO umApatE shivashiva shankara dayAnidhE hara hara
A:  ambOruhadaLa lOcana kalpakAmbikA patE shrI kapAlin
BhasmOd-dhULita dhavaLa kaLEbara bhavahara purahara rajata girIshvara
visamidha nirdUta samacara sakala surAsura sEvita caraNAmbuja jaya
